thread.title: Jim Finley
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Jim Finley

author: Jim Finley
title: Jim Finley
text: The gentlemen that delivered and assembled our furniture were very friendly and quickly put everything together and in its place. The appointment was confirmed numerous times and kept us informed if there was any delay at previous stops. You couldn't ask for better service. Gardner white has done an outstanding job and has wonderful, dedicated employees that do the company proud.
